professional_summary: A passionate software engineer with 5 years of experience in full-stack web development. Skilled in JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

experience.description: Developing and maintaining the company's main web application using React and Next.js. Collaborating with designers to create user-friendly UI/UX. Optimising application performance and accessibility. Implemented a new UI component library, reducing development time by 30%. Led a team of 4 developers in a successful product launch.

projects.name: Portfolio Builder
projects.description: A web application that helps users create personal portfolios.
